questions.question: What specific items are covered under this policy?
questions.description: Defines what the policy applies to within your organization

questions.question: Who is the Document Owner for this Information Security Policy?
questions.description: Identifies the team responsible for maintaining this policy
questions.placeholder: e.g., Information Security, CISO Office, Risk Management

questions.question: Who approved this policy?
questions.description: Shows the authority that approved the policy
questions.placeholder: e.g., Executive Management, Board of Directors, CEO

questions.question: What is the effective date of this policy?
questions.description: Date when the policy becomes enforceable

questions.question: How often will this policy be reviewed?
questions.description: Defines the review frequency for keeping the policy current
questions.placeholder: e.g., Annual, Bi-annual, Upon major change

questions.question: What is the version number of this policy?
What information classification levels does your organization use?
questions.description: Defines how information is classified and handled in your organization
